content:
Today I chose PR 21008 for discussion!

feat(Order/WellQuasiOrder): WellQuasiOrdered predicate
Created by @Violeta Hernández (@vihdzp) on 2025-01-24
Labels: t-order

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Still relevant, went through some review but stalled for the past two weeks.
Feel free to assign this one to me, I'll take a close look today or on Saturday.
Now merged. I don't know who runs this bot, but it would be nice if it mentioned the PR number too so that other bot can put emojis on it
Good idea about integration with the emoji reaction! If changing the output of this bot is difficult (which seems unlikely), making the emoji bot react to Today I chose PR X would also be easy.
Violeta Hernández has marked this topic as resolved.
